titleStmt.title: The decrees of the Parlement of Paris upon a copy of the Pope's brief of the first of January, 1681 and upon the orders sent by the general of the Jesuites to the provincials of Tholouse and Paris : pass'd on the 18th and 20th of June, 1681, in reference to the present contest between the Pope and the King of France about the regale.
Arrests de la cour de Parlement sur une copie d'un bref du pape du premier janvier 1681. English
titleStmt.author: France. Parlement (Paris)

notesStmt.note: Relates to the dispute between Pope Innocent XI and Louis XIV over the droit de régale.
Imperfect: imprint date cropped; date of publication supplied from Wing.
